website_summaries.verdict: A no-frills, inexpensive chalkboard that offers up a surprising amount of quality for the price, so long as you prime it first.
pros: High quality with a decent wood-like frame
cons: Many buyers warn that it is essential that you “prime” this board before use
To do this: rub chalk over the entire surface of the board, then wipe it clean
You can then begin using it

customer_reviews.title: Great for homeschool
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive board to do chalk drawings for our Waldorf style homeschool. I didn't expect much because this is so inexpensive but it works great. You do have to "prime" it first. Take a piece of chalk, rub it over the entire surface, and wipe with a soft cloth. I use Prang ambrite paper chalk and it comes off just fine. Off to purchase another one for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: HayesCrewTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I did season the board first
customer_reviews.text: I've seasoned the board and the chalk still looks very light. It's really hard to get your lettering to look nice on this board. I even tried wetting the dustless chalk first and it was a mess. I'm now going to buy a better quality chalk board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect the chalk board to be real slate, ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect the chalk board to be real slate, but did think the frame was at least real pine or some wood. It is just fierboard with thin paper wood print . I wouldn't have bought it if it had been represented accurately, but had thrown out the package. Save those packages folks!.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: A great chalkboard to use with chalkboard markers
customer_reviews.text: This isn't actual chalkboard material...Which is great for using chalkboard makers because they erase better off of this board. I used to have a job where I made chalkboard signs with real chalk boards and chalkboard makers. If the sign was left too long, the markers would stain the boards (esp white marker). I've had this board for about 9 months now and have made 3 different signs on it with chalkboard makers. Each time, I've left the sign until I needed to make a new one and each time, the markers erased very well (even white). It still looks like a regular chalkboard bit it's less porous.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Hammerschmidt

customer_reviews.title: It works great for our homeschool needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for our homeschool lessons. I use prang chalk and it works well for all the things I need to draw / write for our waldorf homeschool lessons. I would definitely recommend this chalkboard, it's a good size and I have not had any issues with it. Be sure to prime it before using ( First take your chalk and hold it sideways. Then cover the surface of the board with chalk. Next take a dry paper towel or cloth and wipe the chalk into the surface )
customer_reviews.author: H. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Terrible writing surface!!!! Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This board is terrible. The material of the board where you're writing on is cheap and in order to write on it you have to push down hard. It reminds me of just a sheet of black plastic. I had previously bought one of the same company , which was really good. This one disappoints. If it wasn't such a pain to return, I would do so. Very disappointed with this. Will now find another chalkboard that actually works. For the record, I used standard chalk, nothing fancy.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a no frills, straight-up chalkboard. It has a lip for holding chalk, the frame is decent and it is very easy to write on. I did prime it first, like other reviewers suggested. The surface takes chalk well and wipes clean with no problem. I am really pleased with it. You can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: E. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: It's inexpensive and easy to keep updated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang in my garage so I could at a glance keep track of when oil changes and other servicing is due on all of my various motor vehicles in a way that's inexpensive and easy to keep updated. I had a white board for that purpose for several years but I got tired of the markers drying out, so I decided to go old school (no pun intended). A box of multi-colored chalk was 25 cents at the Wally World and will last me forever. The board works well, as did the trick of "priming" it with chalk before the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great chalkboard
customer_reviews.text: I use this chalk bord to help to talk with my mother who is in a care home through her window. It has worked well for both of us. It is easy to write on and easy to clean. A great size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Great board for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sons second birthday board. It worked really well! The quality was great for the price. The frame on the outside was a great finishing touch. I will definitely purchase again if/when I need a chalkboard! I just wish it was a tad bigger!
customer_reviews.author: CB3

customer_reviews.title: Regular chalk doesn't write on this
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk! I tried to use regular crayola chalk; it was as if I was writing on glass. When I finally managed to write a few things, they erased poorly. Can't understand the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chaikin

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: This chalkboard is really great quality, very smooth and the wood is heavy and nice. There are no bumps or anything on the surface which means writing or drawing on it with chalk markers is a dream and cleaning it is really easy too. I was really pleasantly surprised and the quality for the price, really a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Wende Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very nice board
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I needed for. Looked good. The only thing, it was coming apart in the corners, I had to buy Super Glue to put the corners back together. Love the wooden border.
customer_reviews.author: RubiesnDiamonds

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this chalk board. It is definitely good quality at a good price (I love the wood detail). I bought chalk markers to avoid the mess of actual chalk, but I haven't used them on it yet. I'm fairly certain the board won't have any issues with that though. The board comes with hardware for hanging, but I live in an apartment, so I used command strips instead. It's doing great!
customer_reviews.author: jandanman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. It is not even a chalk board, just a black plastic sheet in a frame.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's a chalkboard.
customer_reviews.text: It's a chalkboard. Chalkboards get better with age, so I've waited almost a year to write this review and I'm perfectly happy with it. Yes, you need to "prime" it with chalk. Rub chalk over the whole surface, erase, repeat a couple times. As long as you cure the board, you will be happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: theworldofdale

customer_reviews.title: I used this with and I am pleased. The colors show well and that's all I ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this withand I am pleased. The colors show well and that's all I can ask for in a chalkboard!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I will begin by noting that, like many chalkboards, it needs to be primed. Before tossing it out, try doing that first and erasing multiple times with a wet paper towel. This worked very well for me. Beyond that, the board itself is quite pretty. The border is a bit thicker than the picture would lead you to believe, but for the money it is spectacular quality. I use it as a weekly planner, and for purposes like this it is both the perfect size and quality. I recommend it for someone who plans to use it casually, plus it looks cute in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: A pretty decent chalk board that works pretty well. I did rub chalk all over the chalk board to "prime" it and chalk seems to write decently well on it. Not great, but good enough for making simple lists and the like. It is nice that it also has an indented edge along the edges to hold chalk, so you can orient it in any direction and the bottom edge will hold chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: The chalkboard is light weight and sturdy. I put it in a checked bag from ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chalkboard to create a baby's monthly milestone chalkboard. It came well intact in a plastic wrap with screws to hang up the board. It DOES NOT include chalk. The chalkboard is light weight and sturdy. I put it in a checked bag from Chicago to Boston, and it was still intact without any cracks when I arrived. I didn't experience any trouble with writing with chalk on this board like others have said. I was able to use paint markers and chalk without any trouble. If you're looking for an affordable chalk board so you can make a DIY chalkboard sign, this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: great quality! many people said chalk wouldn't show up
customer_reviews.text: great quality! many people said chalk wouldn't show up, but that is only because they did not prime/season the board. This is crucial and only takes a minute. This is how. basically, just lay the chalk flat on the board, and rub til you have thoroughly covered the entire board, then erase.
customer_reviews.author: Lil junkins

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite purchases. It's the perfect size and super easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Chalkboard because I do calligraphy. This is one of my favorite purchases. It's the perfect size and super easy to clean off. You can easily clean those white streaks that you get from chalk. To add to this, I purchased this and it didn't arrive on time, so I contacted the seller, and they were AMAZING to work with. They ended up shipping me another chalkboard free of charge just because of the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Condition first
customer_reviews.text: This chalkboard works perfectly fine for scoring ping-pong. We conditioned it first, purchased a felt erasure, and use Prang dustless chalk on it. We conditioned it first from a big stick of sidewalk chalk we had in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Berg

customer_reviews.title: I do my best planning standing by the coffee pot in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I use this a lot. I do my best planning standing by the coffee pot in the kitchen. This was the best idea to hang in kitchen. Even my friend has decided to hang one in her kitchen. I don't have problems with it at all. Every once in awhile I need to wipe it down with a wet cloth instead of just an eraser.
customer_reviews.author: Gini Payne

customer_reviews.title: Mounting hardware not included
customer_reviews.text: It works for the intended purpose but it did not come with mounting hardware as the listing and package indicated. The back was ripped open and there was 1 wall anchor (supposed to include 2 anchors and 2 screws). Disappointing since it requires a trip to Home Depot but it's still a decent product and works great for what we wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: MommaD2

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Xmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my 2 year old grandson. He loved it! Not only was he able to draw on it, but it held his magnetic letters. It also came with materials to mount it to a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bart

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Got for my grand daughter. Chalk will not thoughyly clean off with dry cloth or wet cloth. U can still see what u wrote or drew. Not happy. Definitely do not use chalk markers. New! My grand daughter found u can clean the leftovers marks off with a magic eraser.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to make a sign for my grandmas surprise bday party.. I opened the box today and half way through drawing on it I noticed the top corner of the frame is broken!! Unfortunately I don’t have time to wait for a replacement one. Very upset however to get damaged product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the size of the board and was happy with ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the board and was happy with the appearance until a piece of tape accidentally came into contact with the frame. Removing the tape ripped the fake "wood" frame and now my chalk board does not look nice. This will not hold up to time and use.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Great with chalk markers!
customer_reviews.text: This non-porous chalkboard looks beautiful with chalk markers! I use it at my desk at work to write inspiring quotes, schedules, etc. It is tricky to clean though (smear on bottom right is after cleaning with water and hand sanitizer, haven't tried baby wipes yet.) Otherwise, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: A perfect menu board for use with the water soluble chalk ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. A perfect menu board for use with the water soluble chalk markers. It's non-porous and easy to clean. The outside frame is not real wood. It's pressboard with a wood colored coating. Beware that if you put tape on the frame (we did this to keep it on our food truck's serving tray on a windy day) the coating will easy tear off when scotch tape is removed, leaving a paperboard type product exposed beneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Blair

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: its got a coating on it that makes the chalk not stick to it....I have had to color it over and over and erase then do it again just to get to the point where I can see the writing on the board
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for use with Chalk Paint
customer_reviews.text: It's not a porous surface, which works best with actual chalk. This is clearly designed for chalk paint, and it's nice for that use.
customer_reviews.author: Glitter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my granddaughter to write on with her chalk ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my granddaughter to write on with her chalk when she cannot write outside on the sidewalks. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Hanes

customer_reviews.title: But it still writes fine, just wish it wasn't so warped after a ...
customer_reviews.text: Board is very thin, after fastening it to wall on top the bottom warped out and now sticks out roughly an inch from the wall. It's not really a real chalk board as in it's not stone, so I guess you can't expect a whole lot. But it still writes fine, just wish it wasn't so warped after a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty04

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chalk board for my 3 y/o. He had placed a piece of masking tape on the "oak style frame." The oak frame is not real wood...I guess you could gather this from the "oak STYLE frame" description. The masking tape did damage to the frame. The chalk board itself is also not slate. The chalk board was made very cheaply and this was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Luke DeVore

customer_reviews.title: This chalkboard is the perfect size that I was looking for to make my ...
customer_reviews.text: This chalkboard is the perfect size that I was looking for to make my little boys 1st birthday board with! I suggest you buy this one if you are looking to use it for a party, chores or at home schooling, as I will be using it for all of those!
customer_reviews.author: Introvertedbeauty

customer_reviews.title: Neat and clean
customer_reviews.text: I love this chalkboard! It's just the right size for notes in my business and it's so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: John Wood

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed! It is extremely difficult to write with these ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed ! It is extremely difficult to write with these chalk markers and then, super hard to erase. I literally had to hold my finger under the very good quality paper towels and scratch off the writing on my board.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful with Integrity

customer_reviews.title: Also it's annoying that you have to drill two holes in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed--I should have read between the lines that "oak style frame" means particle board with a computer generated image of wood grain. It is not even a veneer of wood. Also it's annoying that you have to drill two holes in the wall to mount it. It doesn't have standard picture mounting hardware screwed to the board.
customer_reviews.author: emi

customer_reviews.title: i love this board
customer_reviews.text: I did not have to prime it. The chalk goes on very smoothly. I love the size for home schooling a 3 year old. The eraser gets rid of all the chalk traces. Every couple of days I wipe down with wet paper towel or cloth. If you wish you could do it every day, I find no need as we use it daily. I love it. Cheap and good enough for my use.
customer_reviews.author: new mom

customer_reviews.title: Great board!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it to document our pregnancy every week and will use it to do the same when the baby is here. I live artsy stuff and pictures so it came in handy. My sister even used it for her 21st birthday photos.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: It's not good if you plan to use it continuously like I ...
customer_reviews.text: Once you wipe away chalk marker from it, it seems to take off a ;ayer of the actual chalk board making it hard to clean... It's not good if you plan to use it continuously like I did for weekly pregnancy pictures...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with that and I'm sure this one will last ...
customer_reviews.text: My last board dudes board lasted about 4 years of very heavy use (as a billiards sign up board) before it became difficult to erase. I'm happy with that and I'm sure this one will last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: chalkboard
customer_reviews.text: This chalkboard met all my expectations, the price was good and my granddaughter loved it. I hung it on the wall and she loves to play school and the chalk and eraser I bought from Melissa & Doug line from amazon was just right. Writing on this chalkboard was great right from the start and the wet wipe markers I purchased from Amazon worked very well and they are such a vivid cooler on the board. A wet paper towel was all we needed to wipe there marker off. I am very pleased with this purchase. Thanks again Amazon for your prompt and very good service.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Season it first
customer_reviews.text: Size is just as big as I needed. I was pleasantly surprised. Make sure you season it with plain chalk before use.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: ... bit worried about this product because of a few poor reviews, but I love this chalk board
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried about this product because of a few poor reviews, but I love this chalk board. I didn't have to prime it, I actually forgot but then remembered so I did any way. I use it as a menu board and am constantly changing it. It is sturdy and the chalk writes beautifully. It is holding up very well!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: But it works for me for just doing random doodles for fun. Gotta " prime " it kinda for my ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay Chalk Board. But it works for me for just doing random doodles for fun. Gotta " prime " it kinda for my chalk to work on it best.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E.

customer_reviews.title: SUPERB.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS BOARD. I wouldn't recommend dry chalk because the board isn't like a dry chalkboard it's a shiny sort of chalkboard, I use wet chalk markers from popart and I decorate the board every month with stuff that represents each month. It looks colorful and great it definitely ties up my whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just as described by many. The board is very light and the frame obviously not wood. However, for the price this board is great. The chalk it came with (in colors) writes very well and crisp on it, it's easy to hang and looks just fine in the kitchen. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lailana

customer_reviews.title: can't believe the bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to hang over my son's little table & chairs set. I can't believe so many people gave it a bad review! We LOVE these. As with all chalkboards, you have to condition it before using. To condition all you do is rub a piece of chalk all over the board and then wipe off with an eraser. It creates a nice chalky layer.... we've never had any problems writing or drawing on our boards with regular old chalk. I even use sidewalk chalk to write on ours. Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, worth it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged in the corner but it’s ealiy fixed and still works well with the chalk markers I already had. We’re using it for simple to-do lists.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Christeson

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! I bought the chalk markers with this to do monthly progress boards for my daughter from 2mos up to 12mos. Perfect size to sit her next to for each monthly pic!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my niece. She loves playing that she’s a teacher. Perfect size for her.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mariela

customer_reviews.title: I bought this with the intention to paint the frame ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intention to paint the frame white but it has some slick finish on it so i had to sand it down first. It arrived packaged really well and arrived really quickly. If i need another, i will definitely buy the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Used these for our wedding and they are perfect! Easily cleaned and the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Used these for our wedding and they are perfect! Easily cleaned and the perfect size! The shipping was fast and secure (no damages anywhere) and the description is exactly like the product!
customer_reviews.author: Calli R

customer_reviews.title: I did and only took a minute and it is a great board I need to go back and put a ...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the reviewer I read when shopping for this who said to prime the board, I did and only took a minute and it is a great board I need to go back and put a yes this helped on that reviewers posting sure it helped alot of people
customer_reviews.author: Stevie H

customer_reviews.title: i really like this board but the chalk I am using is ...
customer_reviews.text: i really like this board but the chalk I am using is not working. I have tried regular chalk and liquid chalk. Please help let me know what I can do! I would like to return it if I cannot ultimately use it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Invest in better quality
customer_reviews.text: Frame is not real wood, doesn’t even look it in person. Fake paper is peeling up around the corners
customer_reviews.author: Lisa & Matt Logan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my kitchen. Just wish they offered a size slightly larger at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worth it! I have it hung up and it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Nice, big, light-weight
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how well it'll hold up over time, but seems to be good quality so far, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jarji Combs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for decorating for events. I used mine with chalk markers and it kept the color perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Y.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect chalkboard! We are using it to track our pregnancy, but can’t wait to use it for other things too!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Chalkboard gold
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple blackboard to hang up and this was a great option for me. It's a good size and very easy to clean off. I was worried that I would have to drill holes into it, but it came with predrilled holes and a bag of stuff to hang it up on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Graham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I used it with wet chalk markers for my boy's first birthday and my girl's Pre-K pictures.
customer_reviews.author: EAPTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and. Functional
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Took two frames apart and put the “black board part into an “A” frame sing I built. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: orange crush

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect board for exploring various mathematical equations AND I can take pictures to document work.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Good chalkboard for smaller office!
customer_reviews.text: Good chalkboard for my office.The kids I work with come in and love drawing on it with colored chalk. It looks perfect in a smaller office.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Marquez

customer_reviews.title: I guess good for an office reminder board or for kids to ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks bigger in pics ! I'm going to have to add a wood under I wanted for a welcome sign for a wedding ! Or add flowers on top for the gap , I guess good for an office reminder board or for kids to play 😑
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product is sturdy and as expected
customer_reviews.text: Used this for chalk paint on my kids first day of school. The product is sturdy and as expected. Chalk markers came right off without leaving residue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A.

customer_reviews.title: Great basic chalkboard
customer_reviews.text: I used this to create a first day of school chalkboard for my kiddo. Worked great. It’s a basic chalkboard. Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R Durbin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten so many compliments & inquiries as to where I got the board! Very happy with the product & the price made it a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Pajija

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I have this board for a couple of weeks now, when I first got it, I think it is pretty good. It looks good, and write and erase good. Chalk does leave marks on it, but not very bad. I just got a Dooley chalk board today, Now that I have something else to compare, I like this one even more. I saved a lot of paper using chalk board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but mostly a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, but mostly a waste of money. Kids just scratch on it with chalk until they start hitting it. Not very big either.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The board is sturdy and also arrived on time. The installing part was a bit tough you need to do it carefully and also felt it was little overpriced. i hanged it on my kitchen wall. Overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: Bought another brand made in China that’s 10X better. Don’t waste your money on
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made!!! Bought another brand made in China that’s 10X better. Don’t waste your money on this
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Fits on the wall and is just what ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Fits on the wall and is just what I was looking for. No more lost messages.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA A. COREN

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Best chalkboard Ever!! It’s the absolute perfect size and love it for writing down reminders or things to get done!!
customer_reviews.author: KelliAnn Husband

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I like that the board is solid and seems pretty durable. I don't like that you have to screw in tiny brackets to the back of the board to be able to mount it to the wall. I wish the brackets came already attached, but it's a pretty good chalkboard other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah  Morrow

customer_reviews.title: This is a good sized chalkboard that is easy to hang up
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sized chalkboard that is easy to hang up! I can't tell if mine was used or not though. I ordered new and when I opened it there was a long brown mark on the board that won't wipe off. The board is black though, so you can only see it in great lighting and if you are up close! If would more than likely order again if I ever needed a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie K.

customer_reviews.title: The wood border can easily splinter on the corners and crack
customer_reviews.text: The wood border can easily splinter on the corners and crack. And the black board is kind of hard and annoying to write on with chalk. It is almost too smooth/sleek-like that it's difficult for the chalk to adhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: It a good size and can be mounted to the wall in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler's "I'm a big sister" announcement and now she gets to draw on it and loves it. It a good size and can be mounted to the wall in her play room. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Willardson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape and generic chalk writes on it just fine. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jkg185

customer_reviews.title: Not a true chalkboard!
customer_reviews.text: The chalk would not write on the chalkboard! I knew when I felt the chalkboard part, it wasn't going to write. The feel of the board is different and not like a chalkboard at all. I ended up putting this out for trash. A complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Fike

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, size is nice
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I expected. Great quality, size is nice, has a chalk ledge. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I had expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a slate chalk board, not a textured plastic one. If I had read other reviews before hand, I would have known that. It works fine once you "season" it as other users suggested. Its not super high quality, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: KCRu

customer_reviews.title: Good for What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: i needed a small chalk board to replace a whiteboard as my cat walked thru the erasable pen & took the words with him. Although this board is slightly warped & scratches easily, it does do what I need it to!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and erases well.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that I could use at work that we could use for specials and this works great. We change it all the time and it erases great with no residue. sturdy made.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very easy to clean, retains liquid chalk colors, especially metallic
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have posted, this board is not the slate type you may be expecting when you think of a chalkboard. However, I used chalk paint markers (designed for chalkboard surfaces) and it suit my purpose just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great board for the price
customer_reviews.text: This relatively cheap board suits my needs just fine. The first few times I tried to write on it the chalk didn't take well - but after a few times erasing it works just as well as a more expensive board, and it's holding together fine after almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it. They use it everyday to draw on
customer_reviews.text: Cute chalkboard. Erases or wipes clean. My kids love it. They use it everyday to draw on.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: It shipped on time and it looks really nice. It came with some parts so that I ...
customer_reviews.text: It shipped on time and it looks really nice. It came with some parts so that I could hang it up. The frame has a little dip on the inside so that it can hold chalk. It's everything I expected. I learned that you should prime new chalkboards, so I did that. I'm not sure if anything bad would happen if I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Price

customer_reviews.title: Quality chalkboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to create a first birthday chalkboard poster. It was a good size for that and worked well with liquid chalk markers.
customer_reviews.author: JJM

customer_reviews.title: Great size and value!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the kitchen for cute seasonal chalkboard signs, grocery lists, or chores boards!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Chalk board
customer_reviews.text: Hey what can I say , it is a chalk board. My mom cannot remember things so I purchased the Chalkboard in order for me to write the date and day and important upcoming events on it and hung it in her tv room. I change it every morning before I leave for work. It helps her during that day.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This chalk board is just OK. The chalk just scratches onto the surface rather than gliding on smoothly, so the writing looks blotchy. I'm not 100% sure whether it's the board or the chalk.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: A little more slick than I'd like (chalk doesn't adhere as well as I thought it would) It's ok -- well made
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Price

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed !
customer_reviews.text: The board has a crack in the frame, and on the "slate" part itself, near the frame crack.
customer_reviews.author: Edward O.

product_meta.title: The Board Dudes Chalk Board - Magnetic Tile w/Chalk Marker & 1 Magnet 11.5" x 11.5"
product_meta.description: This 17” x 23” wood framed black chalk board is a true classic. The black surface is perfect for home or school. Your children can draw big, write small and clean it all up with a quick wipe with a chalk eraser. Features: 17” x 23” Classic wood style framed chalk board Chalk Board surface great for drawing and writing Black surface is perfect for white or colored chalk Surface can be wiped clean with a cloth or felt eraser Mounting hardware included Conserves paper
